text: Edward Calverley (16 August 1826 - 15 September 1897) was an English cricketer. He played twenty-one first-class matches for Cambridge University Cricket Club between 1846 and 1855. ==See also== * List of Cambridge University Cricket Club players ==References== ==External links== * Category:1826 births Category:1897 deaths Category:English cricketers Category:Cambridge University cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Leeds
title: Edward Calverley
